patthana20.3:4.1: Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:4.2: Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:4.3: Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:5.1: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:5.2: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:5.3: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:6.1: Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.3:8.1: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:8.2: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:8.3: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:9.1: Naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.3:10.1: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.3:11.1: Hetuyā pañca … pe … ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.3:12.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.3:14.1: Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:15.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.3:16.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:18.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.3:19.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
